CustomField.description: Hidden field used for reporting and for filtering on list views. Creates a consolidated list of all call delay reason fields.
CustomField.formula: IF( Site_Nurse_places_Triage_on_HOLD__c = TRUE, "Site nurse places triage on HOLD" & "; ", null) & IF( Site_places_Triage_on_HOLD_X2__c = TRUE, "Site places triage on HOLD X2" & "; ", null) & IF( Site_places_Triage_on_HOLD_X3__c = TRUE, "Site places triage on HOLD X3" & "; ", null) & IF( Site_Provider_places_Triage_on_HOLD__c = TRUE, "Site provider places triage on HOLD" & "; ", null) & IF( Site_MSA_places_Triage_on_HOLD__c = TRUE, "Site MSA places triage on HOLD" & "; ", null) & IF( Site_unable_to_answer_questions__c = TRUE, "Site unable to answer questions" & "; ", null) & IF( Site_lacks_info_to_make_solid_decision__c = TRUE, "Site lacks info to make solid decision" & "; ", null) & IF( Provider_unclear_on_information__c = TRUE, "Provider unclear on information" & "; ", null) & IF( LKW_unclear_1_min_to_get_final_LKW__c = TRUE, "LKW unclear, >1 min to get final LKW" & "; ", null) & IF( Criteria_not_met_site_policy_to_call__c = TRUE, "Criteria not met - site policy to call" & "; ", null) & IF( Can_t_hear_caller_Caller_can_t_hear_RN__c = TRUE, "Can't hear caller/Caller can't hear RN" & "; ", null) & IF( Call_confusing_while_gathering_symptoms__c = TRUE, "Call confusing while gathering symptoms" & "; ", null) & IF( Provider_didn_t_promptly_answer_call__c = TRUE, "Provider didn't promptly answer call" & "; ", null) & IF( LKW_is_unknown__c = TRUE, "LKW is unknown" & "; ", null) & IF( TS_provider_not_ready_for_report__c = TRUE, "TS provider not ready for report" & "; ", null) & IF( Lost_connection_of_call__c = TRUE, "Lost connection of call" & "; ", null) & IF( TS_provider_reassigns_report__c = TRUE, "TS provider reassigns report" & "; ", null)
CustomField.label: Delay Reasons
